ai-patthana22.14:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.14:0.3_0: Talking for oneself, doing good things,
ai-patthana22.14:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the six classes of rebirth ...’ ...
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_0: he doesn’t give rise to unprofitable teaching; he doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for causes.
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_1: he doesn’t give rise to unprofitable teaching. Entering a teaching with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_2: Not undetermined, nor indeterminately nature, this is the cause, this is the reason why he doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_3: Unskillful thoughts, nor has not been undetermined; this is why he has not declared by the Teaching.
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_4: Unskillfulness arises in someone who isn’t skilled or undeclared by the Teaching. It’s not due to what is cause or reasonable.
ai-patthana22.14:2.1_6: the five hindrances are not clear.
